alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale; Neshoba; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:34PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Newton, Kemper, southern Neshoba and northwestern Lauderdale Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near House, or 12 miles south of Philadelphia, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Herbert Springs around 540 PM CDT. Forestdale around 545 PM CDT. Damascus around 550 PM CDT. Liberty and Bluff Springs around 555 PM CDT. De Kalb around 600 PM CDT. Electric Mills around 610 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Tucker and Scooba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
